translated: . The Group of Birth Stories of Nāḷimālika
The Elder Kusaṭṭhakadāyaka’s Birth Story🔽“With a confident mind, full of joy,🔽I gave a bundle of kusagrass

analyzed: brāhmaṇassa vusīmataḥ  pasanna cittaḥ sumanaḥ  kusaṭṭhakam adāsaha
translated: the brahmin who had lived the spiritual life.
I gave a bundle of kusagrass;
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of the bundle of kusagrass.
My defilements have been burned up,
Welcome indeed it was for me,
I have done what the Awakened One said.
I have done what the Awakened One said.”🔽Thus the elder Kusaṭṭhakadāyaka recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā kusaṭṭhakadāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā kusaṭṭhakadāyakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: The Elder Kusaṭṭhakadāyaka’s Birth Story is finished.
